title.ta: தவறான / போலி செயலிகள் மற்றும் செயலி அனுமதிகள்

en.text: That free flashlight app asking for camera and contacts — does it make sense?
Permissions are the access rights that apps request to use certain features of your device.
Always grant the least privilege necessary for an app to function. For example, a flashlight app should only need access to the camera.
Examples include a flashlight app requesting camera and contacts (unnecessary) or a game requesting SMS permissions (suspicious).
Check Play Store reviews, developer information, permissions list, and last update date before installing.

ta.text: Adhu free flashlight app camera matrum contacts-kku ketkira — idhu sariyaa?
Anumathigal na ungaloda device-ukku sila features-ai use panna apps ketkira access rights.
Oru app work panna vendiya kadamaiyai thaan kodunga. Udharanama, flashlight app camera-kku thaan vendum.
Udharanangal: flashlight app camera matrum contacts-kku ketkira (thevai illai) illa oru game SMS-anumathi ketkira (suspicious).
Play Store reviews, developer information, permissions list, matrum last update date-a paarunga.
